Posts.Content: I changed doctors and had my mammogram done with the new drs.  My new mammogram was found to be abnormal and my old records was sent for and never received.  I also had an ultrasound and my diagnose was left breast a 1.7cm simple cyst and right breast persistent 1-2 mm nodule within the inferior breast..  directed ultrasound demonstrateds no corr sono abnormality.  They want me to come back in 6 mts for right breast.  I don't really know what's going on and wander should i persue my old records and also should i be receiving more of a definite diagnose before 6 mts. Thank you, Wanda
Posts.Title: Abnormal Mammogram

Posts.Content: Thanks Roseann, i will look into a referral to a Breast Surgeon.  Wanda
Posts.Title: Abnormal Mammogram
